data.message:
leave the bible out of it, this is the LEGAL definition, not the religious definition. ever heard of 'separation of church and state'? what if the gay couple isnt even christian? then 'god' and 'the bible' are irrelevant to their marriage. 
however, more often than not, gay people, having been discriminated against, act more 'christian' than most Christians do. 
'judge not lest ye be judged'
